resources.string: ATV rides are also in Gembira Loka Zoo, feel the thrill of riding this four-wheeled motorcycle.
Enjoy the sensation of circling around the pool and colliding with one another with a Bumper boat.
Bird Show is an introduction to bird behavior when flying in the wild, so visitors can know bird behavior directly.
Feel the ride of the largest mammal on ground, slowly walking on the arena.
Reptile interactions are areas within the RAP zone (Reptiles and Amphibians Park).
Touch various types of fish and various other aquatic animals that are a collection of Gembira Loka Zoo.
This facility has a pool that is only 30cm deep which contains small fish for children to catch.
Ninebot or Smart Wheels is a kind of Self Balancing Electric Scooter that can be controlled by both adults and children.
Visitors can enjoy riding camel rides that cross in the desert typical of the Middle East while taking pictures in front of the pyramid.
Animal shows at Gembira Loka Zoo.
Go around the pool using this goose-shaped paddle boat.
Riding this Catamaran Boat you can surround an artificial lake with beautiful views.
Visitors can freely interact and become a place to introduce animals to children in particular and society in general.
This water vehicle is indeed similar to Jet Sky, the difference is that this water scooter is operated in an artificial pond in the Gembira Loka Zoo.
The only speedboat that runs in the middle of the city of Yogyakarta.
Therapy is becoming a trend in a number of countries including Indonesia, now in the Gembira Loka Zoo.
Gembira Loka Zoo has presented TARING (Mobile Transportation) which will help visitors to interesting places that they want to visit.
Mini trains consisting of 2 (two) passenger cars where each cart can carry 12 children or 8-10 adults.
